column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: An accident occurred at 1 pm April 27
column4: 2020 in front of Bak Touk High School along Street 169.------A pink Mercedes-Benz car
column6: was reportedly driven by a Chinese man along Street 169. The car hit a white PCX
column7: and the motorcycle then hit a Landcruiser. The Mercedes then tried to escape and spun left and hit a divider.------After the incident
column8: local authorities arrived and the vehicles including the driver
column9: were taken to the Phnom Penh Road Traffic Bureau to resolve the matter. ------KBN
